metadata.title: CVE-2025-1181 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability classified as critical was found in GNU Binutils 2.43. Thisvulnerability affects the function _bfd_elf_gc_mark_rsec of the filebfd/elflink.c of the component ld. The manipulation leads to memorycorruption. The attack can be initiated remotely. The complexity of anattack is rather high. The exploitation appears to be difficult. Theexploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. The name of thepatch is 931494c9a89558acb36a03a340c01726545eef24. It is recommended toapply a patch to fix this issue.

criterions.comment: binutils package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
